name: SuspendCardTask
description:
Creates an asynchronous suspension task for a card.

Use this tool to initiate an asynchronous task that suspends a card, preventing its use. The suspension can be reversed if needed.

parameters.name: card_identifier
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the card that needs to be suspended. This identifies the specific card to lock.

parameters.name: idempotency_key
parameters.description: A unique key to recognize retries of the same request; use a random UUID.

value_schema.description: An idempotency key is a unique value generated by the client which the server uses to recognize subsequent retries of the same request. To avoid collisions, we encourage clients to use random generated UUIDs.
